name: Forbidden
storyline: [Name] Shelby, the main character, which was trying to rebel against her parents, is sent to a strange "boarding school" for wealthy families. Hoping to start a new chapter of her life, she'll build new relationships and uncover the dark secrets while roaming the corridors.
summary: Forbidden is a mystery and romance visual novel where the player has the opportunity to choose their own adventure. The player will have to choose a subject for their thesis: History, Mathematics or Literature. You'll unlock different scenes and illustrations with each characters, in addition to have the opportunity to create a bond, learn more about them and their own secrets. Maybe even fall for one of them? Or have a platonic and friendly relationship? The choice is yours!
